Title: Til We Meat Again
Plot: While out with Tara, Alan ends up causing a bar room brawl and as a result, becomes arrested for conspiracy to commit assault and battery. Shirley and Denny represent a man whose steakhouse is being put out of business because the public wants to ban red meat for fear of Mad Cow disease.
GuestStars: Kitana Baker,  Jason Blicker,  Pat Skipper,  Holmes Osborne,  Michael Dempsey,  Francesca P. Roberts,  David Burke,  Takayo Fischer,  Glen Walker,  Rick Yune,  John Short,  Curt Bouril,  Yamil Piedra,  Brandon Mo
